The game wont run at all for me. I installed all the usual prerequisites (Dx, VC++, etc) and it still wont run. I tried running as administrator and in compatibility mode, but nothing helped. Can someone help?

Anyone having an 'access violation' error and crash upon exit from the Dugout to Malangar Greens should load an earlier save game just before Dugout/Mines and wipe Malangar Greens of every enemy down to the last bug. It seems that the cutscene crashes if there are unexpected enemies "in the background" that are not handled correctly.

I had paused the game for over two months until I stumbled upon this solution in the Spellforce official forum. I tried it and it worked perfectly, yay!
